item.title: SnRK1A;OsSnRK1a
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g45420 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0530500 Gene Symbol: SnRK1A OsSnRK1a OsSnRK1A1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: Ta-sro1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Ta-sro1 Gene Name: SIMILAR TO RCD-ONE 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Both the overexpression of Ta-sro1 in wheat and its heterologous expression in Arabidopsis promote the accumulation of ROS, mainly by enhancing the activity of NADPH oxidase and the expression of NAD(P)H dehydrogenase, in conjunction with the suppression of alternative oxidase expression.
